containing_words.word: 朝鮮民主主義人民共和國

sentences.english: The Righteous One takes note of the house of the wicked and brings the wicked to ruin.
sentences.chinese: 義人思想惡人的家，知道惡人傾倒，必至滅亡。

sentences.english: Rejoice in the LORD, ye righteous; and give thanks at the remembrance of his holiness.
sentences.chinese: 你們義人當靠耶和華歡喜，稱謝他可記念的聖名。

sentences.english: The blessing of the Lord is upon the head of the just: but iniquity covereth the mouth of the wicked.
sentences.chinese: 上主的祝福在義人頭上，災禍卻使惡人啞口無言。

sentences.english: A righteous man regardeth the life of his beast: but the tender mercies or the wicked are cruel.
sentences.chinese: 義人顧惜牲畜的生命主，惡人都是殘暴不仁。

sentences.english: 5There they are, overwhelmed with dread, for God is present in the company of the righteous.
sentences.chinese: 他們在那裏大大的害怕，因爲神在義人的族類中。

sentences.english: The mouth of the virtuous utters wisdom and his tongue speaks of what is right.
sentences.chinese: 義人的口傾吐智慧，他的舌頭講論公義。

sentences.english: For there is not a just man upon earth, that doeth good, and sinneth not.
sentences.chinese: 時常行善而不犯罪的義人，世上實在沒有。

sentences.english: The wicked borrow and do not repay, but the righteous have mercy and share.
sentences.chinese: 惡人借貸總不償還，義人卻常好施樂善。

sentences.english: The LORD will not suffer the soul of the righteous to famish : but he casteth away the substance of the wicked.
sentences.chinese: 耶和華不容許義人抵受飢餓，惡人的慾念卻無法得着。

sentences.english: The wicked plotteth against the just, and gnasheth upon him with his teeth.
sentences.chinese: 惡人設謀害義人，又向他咬牙。

sentences.english: The fruit of the righteous is a tree of life, and he who wins souls is wise.
sentences.chinese: 義人所結的果子就是生命樹，有智慧的必能得人。

sentences.english: The mouth of the righteous brings forth wisdom, but the perverse tongue will be cut off.
sentences.chinese: 義人的口滋生智慧，乖謬的舌必被割斷。

sentences.english: The righteous is delivered out of trouble, and the wicked cometh in his stead.
sentences.chinese: 義人得脫離患難，有惡人來代替他。

sentences.english: With their mouths the godless would destroy their neighbors, but by knowledge the righteous are delivered.
sentences.chinese: 不虔敬的人用口敗壞鄰居，義人卻因知識得救。

sentences.english: They band together against the righteous and condemn the innocent to death.
sentences.chinese: 他們大家聚集攻擊義人，將無辜的人定爲死罪。

sentences.english: When the upright man, turning away from his righteousness, does evil, death will overtake him in it.
sentences.chinese: 義人轉離他的義而作罪孽，就必因此死亡。
